Package com.syntax.manage

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbstractCodeAdapter
    This abstact class support APIs to design personal syntax attribute of SyntaxTextArea.
    SyntaxCaretListener
    Listening for caret updating in SyntaxTextArea
    SyntaxHighlightingTool  
    SyntaxHighlightingTool.SyntaxHighlight
    Store highlights that have been applied on SyntaxTextArea
    SyntaxSelectionListener
    Listening for selection updating of SyntaxTextArea
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractKeyBoardShortCut  
    DefaultCodeAdapter
    A basic implementation of AbstractCodeAdapter.
    JavaCodeAdapter
    An implementation of AbstractCodeAdapter.
    JavaKeyWord  
    JavaSyntaxAttributes
    Distribute syntax AttributeSet according SyntaxKind
    SyntaxDocumentTool
    Support basic operations in SyntaxTextArea
    SyntaxHighlighter
    Implement SyntaxHighlightingTool to support highlighting on SyntaxTextArea
    SyntaxHighlighter.SyntaxHighlightePainter
    Support modification of highlighting color
    SyntaxManager
    Hold color and attribute of package.
    SyntaxPainter
    A painter that can mark up registered SyntaxTextArea
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JavaKeyWord.KeyWordKind
    Classification of java key word
    JavaSyntaxAttributes.SyntaxKind
    Classification of syntax
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SyntaxException
    Represent exception during working with com.syntax
